content.html: In the interests of free speech, it's absolutely essential that we stop the free speech of some. We should stop the free speech of anyone we don't like, because our free speech is integral to the world turning. We say, 'free speech for all' - except anyone we want shut up.
content.value:
In the interests of free speech, it's absolutely essential that we stop the free speech of some. We should stop the free speech of anyone we don't like, because our free speech is integral to the world turning. 

We say, 'free speech for all' - except anyone we want shut up.
